name: 2022 5th International Conference on Signal Processing and Information Communications
content: Publicationï¼š Accepted papers of ICSPIC 2022 after undergoing a preliminary review and rigorous peer review will be published in Springer book series Signals and Communication Technology, which will be indexed by Scopus, zbMATH, etc. A few selected papers of extended version will be published in Journal of Communications (JCM, ISSN: 1796-2021 (Online); 2374-4367 (Print)), which will be indexed by SCOPUS; DBLP; ULRICH's Periodicals Directory; etc.
